name: GoFilesBot
description: Telegram's best Open Source ALL-In-One Multi Purpose RoBot. Create your Fork now.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get Bot Token From BotFather Bot

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: ID of a Channel which you want to do Force Sub to use the bot. Example: -100123456789

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB Database URI for Saving UserID for Broadcast. Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aXlF80Cn7iU

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Logs Channel ID for some Tracking XD. Example: -100123456789

CHANNELS.description: List of Channel IDs separated by <space>

USER_SESSION.description: String Session from an admin user

BOTTOM_CAPTION.description: Username of the group to tag in sending medias

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Broadcast as Copy or with Forward Tag. Value should be True/False.
